name: On To A New Galaxy
description:
You are an Astronaut trying to explore 3 planets in a row but if you die on any of the planets you will have to  start all over on a new galaxy.

Controls: A and D or Left and Right Arrows to move or ,  Space bar or Up Arrow to jump, S or Down Arrow  to crouch.

This Is my first try at making a game for a jam game.

Theme: Death is only the beginning.

Source: https://github.com/Jugger95/GameDev.tv-GameJam
